EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! You have a space at the Transform UK Web Development Course!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations! You have secured a space at the Transform UK Web Development workshop! Competition for places was extremely high and your application stood out as someone who is really passionate about the digital industry!
Here is some more information for you:
When: Friday 22nd of July from 10:00 - 18:00. Please aim to arrive at 09:45 for registration.
Where: 60 Great Portland Street, Fitzrovia, London, W1W 7RT (click for link to Google Maps). Nearest tube stations are Oxford Circus, Great Portland Street and Goodge Street. Do ensure you leave in plenty of time to avoid busy commuter traffic.
Lunch is provided but do bring snacks and a bottle of water.
If you require expenses for your travel to be reimbursed please bring a copy of your receipt on the day with you.
If you have any questions do give me a call on 07876836445.
I look forward to seeing you,
Rhiannon
Graduate Associate Manager 07876836445
